content.rendered:
Refugee/Asylum Cases

All Refugee/Asylum Relative cases are processed by DHS/USCIS and the refugee Resettlement Support Center (RSC) located in Nairobi, Kenya. You may contact RSC at:

Refugee Case Inquiries: case@cws-rscnairobi.org
Cultural Orientation inquiries: culturalorientation@cws-rscnairobi.org

The mailing address and telephone number are:

Resettlement Support Center
P. O. Box 14176
Nairobi, Westlands, Kenya 00800
Tel: +254 (0) 20 444 0150/3/4
